page.title: 02INDUSTRY COBRIDGE POTTERY
page.content: On May 17th,a group of us went to Simpsons Pottery works where we watched them making tableware.First of all we observed where the raw materials were delivered,there was sand,ball clay and grog(old broken ware).It was put into a big machine and mixed up.There were manylarge noisy machines all over the factory.There was even a big robot arm that picked up many dishes that had to be cut into shape.First of all it was manto clay then put into moulds,then it was left to dry for a while.After that it was filed down to prevent sharp edges,they sprayed it with fine particles of glass and left it to dry. Next they were put in a large kiln for 16 hours.After cooling they were inspected for damage.Finally they were packed away ready for transport to the shops.
